summary.Title: Delivery Riders for Gorillas in Copenhagen
summary.JobHeadline: Delivery Riders for Gorillas in Copenhagen
summary.Presentation:
Job nr. 171073
Do you want to be a rider and become part of the backbone of the vision to change how people get their groceries? Then read below.
<

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Delivery Riders for Gorillas in Copenhagen
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Job nr. 171073

Do you want to be a rider and become part of the backbone of the vision to change how people get their groceries? Then read below.

The Job

As a Rider with Gorillas, you prefer an active workday and enjoy a day with free exercise during your shift. You like to be active, and you see your job as free exercise since you will be cycling around 40km on a shift - no matter the weather condition. Furthermore, the grocery you will bring will have a maximum weight of 10 kg.

You will have direct contact with the customer, and you must therefore enjoy working in a service-orientated job.

The profile

Since you’ll become part of a social, young, and dynamic environment you will become part of, it is essential that you are outgoing, positive mindset, and proactive. A smile is always a plus.

Practical information

As a Rider, you must comply with the traffic rules due to your role as an ambassador for the company.

E-bikes will be provided and help you get around quickly and easily. Bike helmets will be provided since it is a requirement to wear.

It is necessary to have an iPhone 6 or a version to be able to use the Gorillas' app.

The working base is located in Brønshøj


Salary and working hours

The job is flexible job and goes well with e.g. studies.

Working hours: 07.30-12.30, 16.00-21.00 or 18.00-23.00 Monday-Sunday.

The busiest days are during weekends. We expect that you can take at least 2 shifts during a week.

Salary is 124,20dkk plus customers tips.

Start-date is ongoing.
